Producer: Howard Baldwin, Patrick D. Choi, Victor Hwang, Nile Niami, Steven Seagal
Production Co: Ilshin Investment Co., Interlight, Baldwin/Cohen Productions, Seagal/Nasso Productions
Synopsis: A rural Montana community is threatened when the FBI tries to arrest members of a radical militia group. The militia retaliates by releasing a killer virus into the air, sickening most of the local residents -- but not Dr. Wesley McClaren (Steven Seagal) or his daughter, Holly (Gailard Sartain). It seems that Holly is immune to the virus. As McClaren races to find a cure, militia leader Floyd Chisolm (L.Q. Jones) attempts to kidnap Holly so that his group can make an antitoxin.
Title: The Patriot
